title: GT 4.0 C Common Libraries : System Administrator's Guide

section.title: Introduction
section.para: This guide contains advanced configuration information for system administrators working with C Common Libraries. It provides references to information on procedures typically performed by system administrators, including installation, configuring, deploying, and testing the installation.

important.simpara: This information is in addition to the basic Globus Toolkit prerequisite, overview, installation, security configuration instructions in the GT 4.0 System Administrator's Guide. Read through this guide before continuing!

section.title: Building and Installing
section.para: For instructions on building and installing GT 4.0, see the Installation Guide.

section.title: Deploying
section.para: The C common libraries are available in any GT 4.0 installation.

section.title: Testing
section.para: The C common libraries test suite is included in the globus_common_test package.

section.title: Troubleshooting
section.para: The c common libraries are intended for use by developers, there are no user level troubleshooting techniques.
